Technical Support & Web Development

A timeline of my learning...

December 2021

Google IT Support Professional Certification

This course seemed like a very logical beggining and was the spark which ignited the flame for pursuing a career in Technology! A course which covers a broad range of technological skills and provided a great education in the fundamentals.

Classes Completed

  • Technical Support Fundamentals
  • The Bits and Bytes of Computer Networking
  • Operating Systems and You: Becoming a Power User
  • System Administration and IT Infrastructure Services
  • IT Security: Defense Against the Digital Dark Arts

    • January 2022

    CompTIA A+ Certification

    The industry standard for acquiring a job in Information Technology. I completed this course and passed both tests within a month! It was an insane amount of time spend studying and a real challenge to accomplish. Whole heartedly enjoyed the process and learned so much!

    Course Content and Skills Acquired

  • Basic computer architecture
  • Operating systems (Windows, Linux)
  • Remote connection and virtual machines
  • Computer networking
  • Software management
  • Troubleshooting
  • Customer service
  • Routing concepts
  • VPNs and proxies
  • Systems administration
  • Centralized management
  • Data management and recovery
  • IT security
  • Network security

    • February 2022

    Web Development: HTML5 & CSS3

    I was on my way to begin studies for the CompTIA Network+ Certification ... then I got a bit sidetracked. I accidentally discovered the world of web development... and went crazy. I spent a day researching and decided to learn about Front End Web Development. The beginning point is with HTML and CSS. I am an extremely self motivated individual and decided to take the self study approach. I knew that if I studied hard and built some nice projects, I could save thou$and$ avoiding a bootcamp. I have been following two curriculums and building projects along the way. My sources of study are Free Code Camp and The Odin Project.
    Classes Completed & Skills Acquired
  • Responsive Web Design Certification
  • Construct the skeleton for any webpage or web application with HTML5
  • Modern Styling and Mobile Responsiveness with CSS3
  • Please check out my Github for an example of all the web pages and applications I can build!

    • March 2022

    Web Development: JavaScript

    I am currently focused on learning JavaScript E6. I want to be able to build fully functional and interactive web applications. Thorougly enjoying the problem solving skills and creativity involved in creating functions and dynamic web pages! My primary sourcec of study are the Head First JavaScript Series, Odin Project, and Free Code Camp.

    Applications built and Skills Acquired

  • To Do List Application Check it out!
  • Rock, Paper, Scissors Game Check it out!
  • Calculator Check it out!
  • This portfolio site is built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript! The super cool menu functionality is thanks to JavaScript.
  • I have almost complete the JavaScript and Data Structures Certification with Free Code Camp!

    • Future 2022

    What's Next?

    I want to return to the CompTIA certifications and focus on improving my knowlege and skills in Networking and Cyber Security!
